issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] PhysicalExpr should implement Display trait
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
PhysicalExpr should implement Display trait so that physical query plans can be printed out in human-readable form.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9507?focusedCommentId=17166123) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7812
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7812>
